student: Sebastien Matos, Guillaume Simmen, Jonathan Boulenaz
title: Web Landscape
text: This timeline shows the evolution of the aesthetics of web browsers, reinterpreting the different elements and assembling them as a city.

title: WorldWideMap
text: The timeline presents web access worldwide and other data

title: Web Dictionnary
text: Starting with the first word invented, the "web" itself, this timeline shows the evolution of the vocabulary related to the web presented graphically.

title: Web Influencer Identity
text: This timeline shows the visual identity evolution of the main tech companies on the web through their logo.

title: Web Phenomena
text: This timeline gathers different viral events on the web by proposing a graphical exploration passing among others by the buzzs, the memes and the spamms.

title: Hacks.exe
text: This timeline explore 30 years of hacking on the web and highlights the evolution of the impact of these hacks.
